column15: Follie Black - Bellies  Best Price Rs 1099.00  EMI Rs 183 for 6 months FREE Shipping in 2 Days
column17:
These black coloured bellies from Follie feature a bow and fringe detail. They are slip-on in style and come in flat soles.

Features
  • Colour: Black
  • Style: Slip-on
  • Pattern: Round toe
  • Heel height: Flats
  • Detailing: Bow and fringe detail

Style it up with your casual outfits for an alluring look

Care Tip
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
